Name: Hi-Score Recorder
About the game: Hi-Score Recorder is a simple and intuitive program which allows you to keep track of all of you high scores from your favorite games. Find a new way to enjoy all of your favorite games. Features: - Add your own custom list of consoles and game titles - Keep track of high scores, speed runs, CC, characters used, games beaten, and difficulties - Add your own pictures for games and evidence of your scores
